section.h1: Welcome to the Thomas County Board of Commissioners

strong.a: COVID-19 COUNTY GOVERNMENT PUBLIC ACCESS RESTRICTIONS

u.strong:
We are Thomas County
Radio Broadcast

div.p:
WPAX 1240 AM/103.7 FM at 9:43 am Saturday
(does not air when UGA has a 12:00 Noon game)
WTUF 106.3 FM at 12 Noon on Monday

div.div: 225 North Broad Street, Thomasville, GA, USA

li.div:
County Commission Board meetings are held monthly at the Thomas County Historic Courthouse, 225 North Broad Street 3rd Floor, Commission Chambers, every 2nd Tuesday at 9:00 a.m. and every 4th Tuesday at 6:00 p.m. Locations and times are subject to change with notice.
Tentative Agendas: Tentative agendas will be available at the Commissioners' Office 24-hours before each meeting. Agendas will be posted on the Internet for your convenience as soon as available, normally 24 hours prior to...

div.div: 325 North Madison Street, Thomasville, GA, USA
Thomas County Board of Commissioners, 116 West Jefferson Street, Thomasville, GA, USA

li.div:
The Purchasing Committee meets on the1st Tuesday monthly at the Commissioners Office Conference Room.
Committee Chairman Zippy Vonier, Committee Members Mark NeSmith and Jeremy Rich, Board Chairman serves on all commmittees
During Commissioner Vonier’s absence Commissioner Ken Hickey will serve as chairman.
Tentative Agenda

div.div: Thomas County Board of Commissioners, 116 West Jefferson Street, Thomasville, GA, USA

li.div:
Committee Members: Chairman Ken Hickey, Members Zippy Vonier and Jeremy Rich. The chairman serves on all committees.
Tentative Agendas: Tentative agendas will be available at the Commissioners' Office 24-hours before each meeting. Agendas will be posted on the Internet for your convenience as soon as available, normally 24 hours prior to the meeting.
Tentative Agenda

div.div: Thomas County Historic Courthouse, 225 North Broad Street, Thomasville, GA, USA

li.div:
County Commission Board meetings are held monthly at the Thomas County Historic Courthouse, 225 North Broad Street 3rd Floor, Commission Chambers, every 2nd Tuesday at 9:00 a.m. and every 4th Tuesday at 6:00 p.m. Locations and times are subject to change with notice.
